content: माधुर्यं [मधुरस्य भावः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Sweetness. pleasantness; माधुर्यपीष्टे हरिणान् ग्रहीतुं <ls>R. 18. 13</ls>, <ls>Bh. 2. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Attractive beauty. exquisite beauty; रूपं किमप्यनिर्वाच्य तनोर्माधुर्यमुच्यते. {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Sweetness, one of the three (accord ing to Mammaṭa) chief Guṇas in poetic compositions; चितद्रवीभावमयो ह्लादो माधुर्यपुच्यते <ls>S. D. 606</ls>: see <ls>K. P. 8</ls> also. {@--4@} Kindness, amiability.
